    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Uvod v družbenogeografske značilnosti Slovenije, poselitev</string>
            <string language="en">Settlements in Slovenia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regelungen in Slowenien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Règlements en Slovénie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estabelecimentos em Slovenia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Stabilimenti in Slovenia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τακτοποιήσεις στη Σλοβενία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Establecimientos en Eslovenia</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Pps je namenjen za učenje načina poselitve slovenskih mest ter podeželja. Predvsem gre za predstavitev razlogov za zgoščevanje prebivalstva.</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of different kinds of settlement in Slovenia (capital town, other town, country side).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slovenija</string>
            <string language="en">slovenia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">naselitev</string>
            <string language="en">settlement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mesto</string>
            <string language="en">town</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vas</string>
            <string language="en">village</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung der unterschiedlichen Arten der 
Regelung in Slowenien (Hauptstadt, andere Stadt, Landseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation de différents genres de règlement
en Slovénie (ville capitale, toute autre ville, côté de pays).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação de tipos diferentes do 
estabelecimento em Slovenia (cidade importanta, a outra cidade, o lado
do país).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione dei generi differenti di 
stabilimento in Slovenia (città capitale, l'altra città, lato del 
paese).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση των διαφορετικών ειδών τακτοποίησης στη 
Σλοβενία (κύρια πόλη, άλλη πόλη, πλευρά χωρών).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de diversas clases de 
establecimiento en Eslovenia (la ciudad capital, la otra ciudad, cara 
del país).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Slowenien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regelung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
